queries.querystring:
Select concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',MRC,'#1#',MRC) MRC, concat('MRN_SPE09#06##',ASSET,'#1#',ASSET) ASSET,
concat('MRN_SPE01#ASSETA&arg1=',ASSET) ILIAS, concat('MRN_SPE09#05##',NSN,'#1#',NSN) NSN, concat('MRN_SPE01#SPART&arg1=',NSN) ILIAS2, concat('MRN_SPE07#PN',PN,'#',MFR) PN_MFR, if(STATUS='D',concat('MRN_SPE03#07#MRN_SPE10#AS#',STATUS),concat('MRN_SPE10#AS#',STATUS)) STATUS,
SERIAL, FUNCTION, concat('MRN_SPE06#20#MRN_SPE04#L#',DESCRIPTION) DESCRIPTION, ORGANISM, IFNULL(LIMITATIONS,'MRN_SPE08#white#NO_LIMIT') LIMITATIONS from MRQR_ASSETS A where A.FUNCTION = 'pFUNCTION' limit 0,50
